trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: イベント データを格納している <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule" /> の **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** イベントを処理するメソッドを表します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler>のデリゲートを定義、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>のイベント、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: アクセスすることができます、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>のイベント、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>という名前のサブルーチンを指定することによってクラス**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET アプリケーションの Global.asax ファイルでします。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>中にイベントが発生した、<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest>イベント。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>構築、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>オブジェクト現在を使用して<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>に渡します、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 使用することができます、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>にオブジェクトが指定、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベントの匿名識別子をカスタム値に設定します。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 値を指定しない場合、<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>中にプロパティ、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベント、<xref:System.Guid>を使用します。

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベントは、匿名 id が場合にだけ発生<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>構成要素を設定して`true`です。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 次のコード例では、 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**イベントの匿名識別子をカスタム値に設定します。
